improvements.title: Monorepo and Scoped Package Support
improvements.description: Add better support for monorepo structures with scoped packages. The current include patterns don't account for complex package structures like packages/@scope/component/src/**/*.tsx
improvements.estimatedImpact: Would catch hundreds of components across all React Spectrum packages

improvements.title: React.forwardRef Component Detection
improvements.description: Improve detection of components created with React.forwardRef, which is a common pattern in design systems for ref forwarding
improvements.estimatedImpact: Would catch 50+ forwardRef components in this repo

improvements.title: Collection and Compound Component Patterns
improvements.description: Detect components with special static methods (getCollectionNode) and compound component patterns common in design systems

improvements.title: Tailwind Variants (tv) Component Detection
improvements.description: Add support for detecting components built with tailwind-variants library, which uses tv() function for variant systems
examples: let button = tv({ extend: focusRing, base: '...', variants: {...} })
improvements.estimatedImpact: Would catch all Tailwind-based starter components
